Functions
fza_fnc_sfmplusSetFuel
Description
Parameters
_heli

The apache helicopter to get information from [Unit].

Returns

The mass of the forward and aft fuel cells.

Examples

...  _fuelMass = [_heli] call fza_fnc_setFuel; _fwdFuelMass = _fuelMass select 0; _aftFuelMass = _fuelMass select 1;
